lines.text: We do this kinda stuff to him all through the picture!
Why you... you little blankety-blank-blank toitle... how did... you did... I didn't...
Onetwothreefourfivesixseveneightnineten! And I hope ya choke!

[after reading title]
"Tortoise Beats Hare"? Why those stupid joiks don't know what they're talking about! And I outta know, I woik for 'em!
Hey, you turtle! Come out of there!
Or I'll huff! And I'll puff! And I'll blow your house...
Oh, sorry. Pardon me. Wrong story.
